name: Police RPG
description:
Controls:

Z, X, Enter and the Arrow keys. You can also use your mouse.


Trailer

What is this?

Being a police is cool, it's a sick experience and we all love rpg games even though they've been there for 15 years.Thats whats police rpg is all about you get to be the dope police man, Dave who of course catches those criminal who are full bastards.The game has great rpg look, nice gameplay and is completely FREE. Play RPG POLICE now and be the police man that goes down in the history.
